titleStmt.title: Die Martis scilicet xvj die Novemb. anno Dom. 1641 annoq. regni regis dom. nostri Caroli, xvij whereas the present condition and danger of this kingdom doth require from all His Maiesties good and faithfull subjects of the same, a speedie levie of forces ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first lines of text.
"Copia veram Exam. per Phil. Percivall Cleric. Parliament."
